confirmForward(bytes32,int256,uint256,ui.details: Called by cron job AFTER FeedProxy.updateRoundData() succeeds

pollFeed(bytes32,uint80,int256,uint256,u.details: Does NOT update state - state is only updated via confirmForward()

pollFeed(bytes32,uint80,int256,uint256,u.notice: Check if update should be forwarded and return decision
